```{r world energy consumption dataset}

```


```{r import all datasets from GitHub}

# world energy consumption dataset

wec <-  read_csv("https://github.com/ben-luc-hol/Energy-Use-Project/blob/main/data/world_energy_consumption.csv")

#CO2 emissions (metric tons per capita per year) - World Bank, 2022
co2_emissions <-  read_csv("https://github.com/ben-luc-hol/Energy-Use-Project/blob/main/data/CO2_emissions.csv")

#fertility
fertility <- read_csv("https://github.com/ben-luc-hol/Energy-Use-Project/blob/main/data/fertility_rate.csv")

#infant mortality
infant_mort <-  read_csv("https://github.com/ben-luc-hol/Energy-Use-Project/blob/main/data/infant_mortality.csv")

#life expectancy at birth
life_exp <-  read_csv("https://github.com/ben-luc-hol/Energy-Use-Project/blob/main/data/life_expectancy.csv")

#literacy
literacy <-  read_csv("https://github.com/ben-luc-hol/Energy-Use-Project/blob/main/data/literacy.csv")

terms_of_trade <-  read_csv("https://github.com/ben-luc-hol/Energy-Use-Project/blob/main/data/terms_of_trade.csv")

```
